hero.title: Time's Up! Bike Co-op
hero.tagline: A volunteer-driven space in the East Village for accessible bicycle repair. Fix your bike or just chit chat about it

howItWorks.heading: How It Works?
howItWorks.text: Bring your bike, sign in and explain the issue to the volunteer mechanic. They will provide the tools and guidance but you will be hands on with the bike. Suggested $2 donation covers tool use and supplies. We also sell used parts onsite,

helpfulTips.heading: Helpful Tips
tips: Come early. Fixing one problem sometimes uncovers another
No new projects 30 minutes before closing
Check our Instagram for holiday/inclement weather hours and special events
